languages.text: "Ты чувствуешь изъяны в себе и признаешь их — это благо. Воистину, сомнения и искушения — страшнейшие наши враги, ибо они оборачивают праведников в еретиков".

"You can sense flaws within you and admit to them freely, and that is good. Indeed doubts and temptations are the most terrible of our foes, for they are the bane that turns a righteous warrior into a heretic."
languages.original_text: "Ты чувствуешь изъяны в себе и признаешь их — это благо. Воистину, сомнения и искушения — страшнейшие наши враги, ибо они оборачивают праведников в еретиков".

languages.text: "Ihr spürt Fehler in Euch und gesteht sie Euch offen ein. Das ist gut. Tatsächlich sind Zweifel und Versuchungen unsere schrecklichsten Gegner, denn sie sind die Geißel, die aus einem rechtschaffenen Krieger einen Ketzer macht."
languages.original_text: "You can sense flaws within you and admit to them freely, and that is good. Indeed doubts and temptations are the most terrible of our foes, for they are the bane that turns a righteous warrior into a heretic."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr spürt Fehler in Euch und gesteht sie Euch offen ein. Das ist gut. Tatsächlich sind Zweifel und Versuchungen unsere schrecklichsten Gegner, denn sie sind die Geißel, die aus einem rechtschaffenen Krieger einen Ketzer macht."

languages.text: « Vous n'avez pas honte de reconnaître vos lacunes, et c'est une bonne chose. En vérité, le doute et la tentation sont nos pires ennemis, car ils sont le fléau qui transforme un guerrier vertueux en hérétique. »
languages.original_text: "You can sense flaws within you and admit to them freely, and that is good. Indeed doubts and temptations are the most terrible of our foes, for they are the bane that turns a righteous warrior into a heretic."

traits.locale_text: « Vous n'avez pas honte de reconnaître vos lacunes, et c'est une bonne chose. En vérité, le doute et la tentation sont nos pires ennemis, car ils sont le fléau qui transforme un guerrier vertueux en hérétique. »

languages.text: 「あなたは己の中に欠点を感じ、それを自由に認めることができる。疑いや誘惑は我々の敵の中でも最も恐ろしいものであり、正義の戦士を異端者に変えてしまう災いなのだ」
languages.original_text: "You can sense flaws within you and admit to them freely, and that is good. Indeed doubts and temptations are the most terrible of our foes, for they are the bane that turns a righteous warrior into a heretic."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたは己の中に欠点を感じ、それを自由に認めることができる。疑いや誘惑は我々の敵の中でも最も恐ろしいものであり、正義の戦士を異端者に変えてしまう災いなのだ」

languages.text: «Puede identificar sus carencias y admitirlas libremente, y eso es algo bueno. Es cierto: las dudas y las tentaciones son nuestros enemigos más terribles, pues son la perdición que condena a los guerreros virtuosos a la herejía».
languages.original_text: "You can sense flaws within you and admit to them freely, and that is good. Indeed doubts and temptations are the most terrible of our foes, for they are the bane that turns a righteous warrior into a heretic."

traits.locale_text: «Puede identificar sus carencias y admitirlas libremente, y eso es algo bueno. Es cierto: las dudas y las tentaciones son nuestros enemigos más terribles, pues son la perdición que condena a los guerreros virtuosos a la herejía».

languages.text: “你能察觉到自己的缺点，而且愿意坦然承认，这很好。没错，怀疑与诱惑是我们最可怕的敌人，它们会诱使心怀正义的战士堕落为异端分子。”
languages.original_text: "You can sense flaws within you and admit to them freely, and that is good. Indeed doubts and temptations are the most terrible of our foes, for they are the bane that turns a righteous warrior into a heretic."

traits.locale_text: “你能察觉到自己的缺点，而且愿意坦然承认，这很好。没错，怀疑与诱惑是我们最可怕的敌人，它们会诱使心怀正义的战士堕落为异端分子。”

languages.text: "İçindeki kusurları hissedebiliyor ve bunları özgürce itiraf edebiliyorsun. Bu iyi bir şey. Şüphesiz ki şüpheler ve ayartıcı duygular, erdemli bir savaşçıyı dahi kâfire dönüştürebilecek birer felaket olduklarından en büyük düşmanlarımız arasındadır."
languages.original_text: "You can sense flaws within you and admit to them freely, and that is good. Indeed doubts and temptations are the most terrible of our foes, for they are the bane that turns a righteous warrior into a heretic."
